title: Portrait de la jeune fille en feu
overview: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

title: El secreto de sus ojos
overview: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: Hiroshima mon amour
overview: A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.

title: Fa yeung nin wah
overview: Two neighbors, a woman and a man, form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.
stars: ['Tony Chiu-Wai Leung', 'Maggie Cheung', 'Ping Lam Siu', "Tung Cho 'Joe' Cheung"]

title: Jules et Jim
overview: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

title: Dà hóng denglong gaogao guà
overview: A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.

title: Bom Yeoareum Gaeul Gyeoul Geurigo Bom
overview: A boy is raised by a Buddhist monk in an isolated floating temple where the years pass like the seasons.

title: Gegen die Wand
overview: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.

title: Ah-ga-ssi
overview: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

title: Dev.D
overview: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?

title: Un long dimanche de fiançailles
overview: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

title: Der Himmel über Berlin
overview: An angel tires of overseeing human activity and wishes to become human when he falls in love with a mortal.

title: La leggenda del pianista sull'oceano
overview: A baby boy, discovered in 1900 on an ocean liner, grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: Gilda
overview: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

title: Brief Encounter
overview: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

title: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
overview: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

title: The Lunchbox
overview: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

title: Smultronstället
overview: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

title: The Red Shoes
overview: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.
